wlcstat.wlcave¶

wlcstat.wlcave.r2_ave(length_kuhn, dimensions=3)[source]¶

Calculate the average end-to-end distance squared for the wormlike chain model

Parameters

  • length_kuhn (float) – The length of the chain in Kuhn lengths

  • dimensions (int) – The number of dimensions (default to 3 dimensions)

Returns

r2 – The mean-square end-to-end distance for the wormlike chain model

Return type

float

wlcstat
